entry.title: Nestle Orange Smarties Milk Chocolate Bar - 90 g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Nestle UK
Type: Chocolate
Price: 3.51

Orange Smarties with Milk Chocolate...

That sounds good! Delicious milk chocolate stuffed with orange Smarties. The sweet genius who thought of this creation must have been seating Smarties. Because you are what you eat.

  • British Candy
  • Paper Packaging
  • No Artificial Colours, Flavours or Preservatives. That's Smart!

90g

entry.title: Milkybar Smarties Block UK - 100g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Nestle
Type: Chocolate
Price: 3.99

New Colourful Milkybar!

If you love the classic Milkybar, you'll love what they've added to their famous white chocolate recipe. They've turned up the fun by adding in delicious Nestle Smarties! The Milkybar Smarties sharing block has the creamy-tasting Milkybar white chocolate that you love, with the fun, colourful crunch of Smarties! Perfect for moments of simple fun. Made with natural flavourings, it's good to share!

100 g

entry.title: Nestle Smarties Milk Chocolate Tablet Bar - 100 g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Nestle
Type: Chocolate
Price: 4.49

A new way to eat Smarties candies!

Snap off a piece of… SMARTIES? That's right! Nestle Smarties Milk Chocolate Tablet Bar is a new way to experience - and share - the love of candy-coated, milk chocolate Smarties. This milk chocolate bar is filled with mini Smarties candy-coated milk chocolate pieces adding a colourful crunch within smooth chocolate deliciousness. It's easy to break off one of the 18 square pieces to share with family and friends. Plus, it's all wrapped up in recyclable paper packaging, which helps ensure that the environment stays as vibrant as Smarties pieces. Made in Switzerland with 100% natural colours and flavours, Nestle purchases 100% RAINFOREST ALLIANCE certified cocoa, as part of the NESTLÉ Cocoa Plan. They work with the Rainforest Alliance and farmers to improve the quality of their products and strengthen their communities.

  • Made in Switzerland
  • No Artificial Colours
  • No Artificial Flavours
  • UTZ Certified

    • 100 g

entry.title: Nestle Smarties Buttons - 95g
entry.summary:
Vendor: CandyFunhouse.ca
Type: Chocolate
Price: 5.99

Nestle Smarties Buttons 

Imported from the UK

Get together with friends, family film night or just for a special treat - share the delicious colourful fun of Smarties Buttons. Yummy smooth milk chocolate buttons filled with colourful mini Smarties sweets.

Deliciously smooth milk chocolate has been at the heart of Smarties for more than 80 years and, in 2005, Smarties was the first UK major confectionery brand to move to no artificial colours - more reasons to enjoy Smarties..

Smarties only select quality, 100% certified sustainable cocoa beans through the Nestlé® Cocoa Plan ®, which aims to improve the lives of cocoa farming communities and the quality of their products.

  • No Artificial Colour
  • No Artificial Flavours
  • No Preservatives

95 g

entry.title: Nestle Smarties White Chocolate Buttons - 85g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Nestle UK
Type: Chocolate
Price: 4.99

Imported from the UK

Get together with friends, family film night or just for a special treat - share the delicious colourful fun of Smarties Buttons. Yummy smooth white chocolate buttons filled with colourful mini Smarties sweets.

Deliciously smooth white chocolate has been at the heart of Smarties for more than 80 years and, in 2005, Smarties was the first UK major confectionery brand to move to no artificial colours - more reasons to enjoy Smarties..

    85 g

    Ingredients:

    Sugar, Skimmed Milk Powder, Cocoa Butter, Butterfat (from Milk), Lactose and Proteins from Whey (from Milk), Whey Powder (from Milk), Vegetable Fats (Mango Kernel, Palm, Sal, Shea), Cocoa Mass, Fat-Reduced Cocoa Powder, Wheat Flour, Rice Starch, Dried Whole Milk, Emulsifier (Sunflower Lecithin), Fruit and Vegetable Concentrates (Safflower, Radish, Black Carrot, Lemon, Hibiscus, Grape, Blackcurrant), Spirulina Concentrate, Glazing Agents (Carnauba Wax, Beeswax White, Gum Arabic, Shellac), Natural Flavourings, Colours (Red Beet, Curcumin, Beta-Carotene), Barley Malt Extract, White Chocolate contains Vegetable Fat in addition to Cocoa Butter. Allergy Information: Contains: Barely, Milk, Wheat

    Allergy Information: Contains: Barley, Milk, Wheat

    Ingredients and nutritional information provided by the manufacturer are considered accurate at the time of posting. Refer to product labelling or contact manufacturer directly for the current date

entry.title: Smarties Sharing Block UK - 100g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Nestle
Type: Chocolate
Price: 4.99

Smarties Sharing Block from the UK

This Smarties Chocolate bar from Nestle UK features mini smarties covered in delicious milk chocolate. The smooth milk chocolate combines very well with the crisp sugar shell that adds a light crunch to the overall chocolate bar.

  • Colourful milk chocolate sweets in a crisp sugar shell
  • Coloured by nature - from food and plant extracts only
  • With no artificial flavours, colours or preservatives

﻿(100g) 

Ingredients:

Sugar, Dried Whole MILK, Cocoa Butter, Cocoa Mass, Vegetable Fat (from Palm/Shea/Sal/Illipe/Kokum Gurgi/Mango Kernel), Lactose and Proteins from Whey (from MILK), Whey Powder (from MILK), Butterfat (from MILK), Skimmed MILK Powder, WHEAT Flour, Emulsifier

Ingredients and nutritional information provided by the manufacturer and considered accurate at the time of posting. Refer to product labelling or contact manufacturer directly for current data.

entry.title: Smarties Mega Lolly
entry.summary:
Vendor: Smarties
Type: Candy
Price: 0.99

Retro American Candy

A sweet and tart taste from these Smarties Mega Lollies. A Retro Candy favourite from the 1970s. If you love the taste of American Smarties then these Smarties Mega Lollies are for you. Two great flavours in one. You are what you eat..become a Smartie!

entry.title: Nestle Smarties Candies - 45g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Nestle
Type: Chocolate
Price: 1.99

A Classic Canadian Candy

Candy Coated Chocolate Chocolate Candies

Smarties Candies have been a part of Canada's candy tradition for over 77 years! Made by Nestle Canada at their Toronto, Ontario Canada chocolate factory. Colourful and crunchy candy-coated chocolate candies that make you smart. Yes, you are what you eat! Smarties have no artificial colours or flavours. That's pretty sweet! Smarties Candies come in eight colours: Red, Orange, Yellow, Green, Purple, Pink, Blue & Brown.  And Smarties has updated the packaging with the make 'em last pack.

The question is-"Do you eat the red ones last?"

  • Made in Canada
  • Peanut Free
  • No Artificial Colours
  • No Artificial Flavours
  • UTZ Certified

    • Smarties Candies are one of the Top 10 Canadian Candies.

    Watch this cool 1980's Smarties Candy commercial.

    45 g

    Ingredients: 

    Milk chocolate (sugar, milk ingredients, cocoa butter, cocoa mass, whey powder, lactose, soya lecithin, polyglycerol polyricinoleate, natural flavour), sugar, wheat flour, modified corn starch, carnauba wax, colour.

    Ingredients and nutritional information provided by the manufacturer and considered accurate at the time of posting. Refer to product labelling or contact the manufacturer directly for current data.
